title: Twitter reacts to Frank Mir's win over Roy Nelson in Bellator 231 rematch
text:
Frank Mir snapped his four-fight losing skid on Friday when he defeated Roy Nelson in the Bellator 231 main event.

Mir (19-12 MMA, 1-2 BMMA) earned a second career victory over Nelson (23-18 MMA, 1-4 BMMA) when he emerged on top by unanimous decision in the heavyweight rematch, which took place at Mohegan Sun Arena in Uncasville, Conn., and aired on Paramount.

Check below for the top Twitter reactions to Mir’s win over Nelson at Bellator 231.

* * * *

It's time for the #Bellator231 headliner! Former UFC champ @TheFrankMir is set to run it back with @RoyNelsonMMA after winning the first bout in May 2011. https://t.co/ElGf9Fe56e pic.twitter.com/p1TrWDLaSo — MMA Junkie (@MMAjunkie) October 26, 2019

I have no memory of Mir-Nelson 1. I watched it, but couldn't tell you a thing about it. — caposa (@Grabaka_Hitman) October 26, 2019

Mir landing leg kicks at will and nice left crosses. Wins the first. #Bellator231 — Seán Sheehan (@SeanSheehanBA) October 26, 2019

Roy Nelson appears to be wearing three pairs of shorts. — Dann Stupp (@DannStupp) October 26, 2019

10-9 Mir pretty easy — MaddDogg (@NateMillerMMA) October 26, 2019

I can’t wait to see the rematch of this fight in Bare-Knuckle Boxing next week. #Bellator — MMA Roasted (@MMARoasted) October 26, 2019

You can always count on Mir to add some new wrinkle to his game. Nelson is the exact opposite. He's been the same fighter for 15 years. — caposa (@Grabaka_Hitman) October 26, 2019

WE GO TO THE SCORECARDS!!!! — Danny Brener (@DannyBrener) October 26, 2019

Ref, at final bell, tells Nelson and Mir "great fight". He lied. — Fight Ghost (@Fight_Ghost) October 26, 2019
